entry.title: Sublimation Paper
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Sublimation Transfer Paper
Price: 1.50 - 2.00 (2 variants)

Single side coated paper especially designed for use with sublimation inks.  Print onto the brighter white side of the paper to sublimate onto a large variety of polyester coated imprintable blanks, including polyester shirts, mugs, water bottles, mouse pads, ceramic tiles, and many more!

8.5X11 and 8.5X14

entry.title: Custom Sublimation Transfers
entry.summary:
Vendor: SciptDesigns
Type: Sublimation Transfer Paper
Price: 5.00 - 7.00 (2 variants)

***The attached pictures are examples of what you may set-up on a sheet for printing.

We offer high quality ready to press sublimation transfers and blanks. You must prepare your completed file with your desired pictures.  What you send us is exactly what we will print out.  Please see below for file requirement. NOTE - You may fit as many designs on your page according to the sheet size.

Fabrics and Blanks for Sublimation

- Fabric must have a high polyester percentage (over 50%).  100% polyester is recommended for the most vivid colors.

- 50/50 poly blend fabrics are usable however 100% poly will provide ideal, deep, full color results. 100% cotton, hemp, wool, or natural fabrics WILL NOT work.

- Dye sublimation works with WHITE or LIGHT COLOR polyester fabrics only.

- Dye Sublimation DOESN'T have white ink. Any white in your graphic will be void of color (no ink), therefore the white will become the color of the fabric.

- Sublimation can also be applied on hard goods. They must be specially coated for dye sublimation technology (mugs, tiles, bottles and more).

!!!NO IRON!!! These are not IRON-ON Transfers! A heat press is required!

- Press time and temperatures will vary depending on the product onto which it will be applied.  

Send  your file to Nicole at scriptdesignscustomwork@gmail.com

FILES:

-Ideal file type(s): TIFF, JPG, PDF
-Color Format: RGB
-File Size / Resolution: 200 to 300 d.p.i 

-If you do not wish to have your image mirrored, let us know.


IMPORTANT

Your transfers will only turnout as good as the files you send us. If you send a low quality, internet sized pictures / files (72dpi or less) you will receive less than ideal transfers. 

We are not responsible for your finished product.
